query: mutation createPaper($command: CreatePaperCommandInput!) {  createPaper(command: $command) {  ...paper  __typename  } }  fragment paper on Paper {  reference  shortName  name  description  body {  reference  shortName  name  levels {  reference  shortName  name  __typename  }  __typename  }  levels {  reference  shortName  name  __typename  }  isCba  examSchedule  timeInHours  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
